oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Low regularity solutions for Chern-Simons-Dirac systems in the temporal and Coulomb gauge
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pecher, Hartmut
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Analysis of PDEs
35Q40, 35L70
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We prove low regularity local well-posedness results in Bourgain-Klainerman-Machedon spaces for the Chern-Simons-Dirac system in the temporal gauge and the Coulomb gauge. Under slightly stronger assumptions on the data we also obtain "unconditional" uniqueness in the natural solution spaces.
Comment: 15 pages. arXiv admin note: text overlap with arXiv:1409.4588
